sentences.en: Fishing boats and pleasure - craft followed the great liner into the harbour.
sentences.cn: 渔船和游艇跟随着大型班轮进入了港口.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its liner counterpart , poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物聚苯,极不易溶解.

sentences.en: I did once dream of becoming the first woman to captain an ocean liner.
sentences.cn: 我确实曾经梦想过成为首位远洋客轮的女船长。

sentences.en: Is there any aerial liner between Paris and Hong Kong?
sentences.cn: 法国和香港之间有定期航班 吗 ?

sentences.en: Jumbo jets somehow lack the glamour of the transatlantic liner.
sentences.cn: 大型喷气式飞机不像橫渡大西洋的客轮那么引人注目.

sentences.en: People on shore greeted the new 10 , 000 liner by waving their arms as it was getting up.
sentences.cn: 当新造的万吨巨轮驶近时, 岸上的人们挥臂欢迎.

sentences.en: The liner flew straight [ directly ] to Nanjing.
The liner is in dock for a refit.
The liner ran down a fishing - boat during the dense fog.
sentences.cn: 在浓雾中,客轮撞翻了一条渔船.

sentences.en: The liner set sail for New York at 8:30.
sentences.cn: 轮船在八时半启航开往纽约.

sentences.en: The old record - breaking Cunard liner Campania had just been sold for scrap.
sentences.cn: 丘纳德公司老掉牙的破纪录邮船“坎帕尼亚号”刚刚被作为废钢出售了.

sentences.en: The suitcase liner is a piece of soft cloth.
sentences.cn: 箱子的衬里是一块很软的布.

sentences.en: The transatlantic liner forged ahead through the waves.
sentences.cn: 横渡大西洋的客轮破浪前进.

sentences.en: Then he would take an air liner to another city for travel.
sentences.cn: 然后他会乘一架班机去另一个城市旅游。

sentences.en: They launched a new passenger liner.
sentences.cn: 他们使一艘新的客轮下水.

words.tran_cn: 排成一行；划线于；以线条标示；使…起皱纹
[水运]班轮，[航]班机；[机][铁路]衬垫；画线者

phrases.tran_cn: 内衬；橡胶密封层；气密层
远洋班轮；远洋定期客轮

trans.tran_cn: 班轮，班机，衬垫，衬套，衬里，画线者
trans.tran_en: a passenger ship or airplane run by a shipping line or airline
